snippet: Cristián Samper, the new president of the Wildlife Conservation Society, said he was motivated to take the job by a sense of urgency about the state of the world’s wildlife.
abstract: Profile of Cristian Samper, recently appointed as president and chief executive of the Wildlife Conservation Society, headquartered at the Bronx Zoo; says he was motivated to take the position by a sense of urgency about the state of the world's wildlife.
lead_paragraph: Cristián Samper, the new president of the Wildlife Conservation Society, said he was motivated to take the job by a sense of urgency about the state of the world’s wildlife.

headline.seo: New President of Wildlife Conservation Society Says Mission Is to Protect Species
headline.main: As Species Vanish, Taking Up a Mission to Protect Birds and Beasts
headline.print_headline: Taking Up a Mission to Protect the Birds and the Beasts
